dcterms:description: A dataset containing around 2.3 million geo-tagged tweets posted in Los Angeles during the periods of August 1, 2014 to November 30, 2014 and August 1, 2015 to November 30, 2015.
dcterms:title: Geotagged Tweet Dataset

dcterms:description: A dataset consisting of around 1 million reviews from Google Maps in New York City, including location coordinates, timestamps, review contents, user ratings, and place types.
dcterms:title: Google Map Place Review Dataset
